description.ruby-sapphire:
Spores cling to the foe,
sharply reducing SPEED.
description.emerald:
Spores cling to the foe,
sharply reducing SPEED.
description.firered-leafgreen:

cling to the foe,
sharply reducing
its SPEED stat.

effect.full: Lowers the target's Speed by two stages.
